casebody.data:
Robert L. ROYER
v.
OUR LADY OF THE LAKE HOSPITAL, INC., Our Lady of the Lake Physician Group, LLC, Keith Brian Hodge, M.D., Lura Laborde Wight, M.D., and Louisiana Cardiovascular Specialists, LLC d/b/a Louisiana Cardiology Associates NO. 2019-C-0489 Supreme Court of Louisiana. May 28, 2019

Denied.
